about_the_game:
Driving Rogue plunges you into a high-speed rogue-like challenge where every race is a fight for survival and mastery. Navigate treacherous city streets, execute precise maneuvers, and unlock the mysteries of your past with each victorious run.

Core Gameplay

Drive, drift, and deploy unique abilities to dominate the roads. Master the art of precision driving to finish each level in an optimal state and unlock potent upgrades and new challenges.

Co-Op Mode

Tackle the challenges with a friend in co-op mode, where teamwork and strategy are key to overcoming the odds and advancing the story together.

Retro Fusion Style

Experience a visually striking blend of pixel art and comic book aesthetics, accompanied by a diverse soundtrack that complements the game's retro, yet modern vibe. This stylistic approach not only enhances the gameplay but also immerses you fully in a world that feels both nostalgic and refreshingly new.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.3 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: 9.0c compliant
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 – 8600K (3.6 GHz) / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X (3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 (2GB) / AMD Radeon RX 570 (2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: 9.0c compliant
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Driving Rogue is a driving, online co-op, roguelike adventure inspired by London! Navigate a shifting cityscape, outsmart the sinister NeuraTech, and unravel your past. Each race reshapes the challenge, demanding skills and strategy as you drive through to victory!
